EmailTemplate.name: CCR 19 Autumn Changes notification
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS with The Challenge Autumn programme - seasonal changes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team.
Dear {!Contact.Name},
The NCS with The Challenge Autumn programme is nearly here and we hope you are looking forward to it as much as we are!
As you may be aware, the autumn programme is slightly different to the summer programme - largely in its structure, staffing requirements and length.
Please read through this short document, which highlights the differences between the programmes, before you start your role so that you can raise any questions you have with your teams before the programme begins.
Click here to view the NCS with The Challenge Autumn Programme https://staffing.the-challenge.org/assets/NCS_with_The_Challenge_%E2%80%93_Autumn_Programme_2014.pdf
For more information please contact your local staffing representative quoting the email reference number in any correspondence.
Kind regards,
NCS with The Challenge
CCR 19
